abstract: Protecting the electronic records of your business has gotten easier and more affordable, thanks to services that can make backups of computer files across the Internet.
snippet: Protecting the electronic records of your business has gotten easier and more affordable, thanks to services that can make backups of computer files across the Internet.
lead_paragraph: PROTECTING the electronic re- cords of your business has gotten easier and more affordable, thanks to services that can make backups of computer files across the Internet.

headline.main: So Much Data, and So Many Ways to Guard It
headline.print_headline: So Much Data, and So Many Ways to Guard It

abstract: In part of a hard-nosed takeover campaign that Microsoft began two weeks ago, the company has begun preparing for a proxy fight to oust Yahoo’s directors.
snippet: In part of a hard-nosed takeover campaign that Microsoft began two weeks ago, the company has begun preparing for a proxy fight to oust Yahoo’s directors.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft has begun to make preparations to proceed with a proxy fight against Yahoo as it seeks to gain control of the Internet company, people briefed on the matter said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Microsoft Said to Plan Proxy Fight for Yahoo
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Said to Plan Proxy Fight For Yahoo

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Miguel Helft

abstract: The Yahoo deal is unfolding in playbook form. Microsoft has mailed in its bear-hug letter, Yahoo has adopted a polite “just say no” posture, and now The New York Times has reported that the Microsoft board is about to authorize going “hostile” on Yahoo by authorizing a proxy contest to replace the Yahoo board. In the latest news, Yahoo announced late Tuesday that it has adopted a severance plan for all of its employees in case of a change of control of Yahoo.
lead_paragraph: The Yahoo deal is unfolding in playbook form. Microsoft has mailed in its bear-hug letter, Yahoo has adopted a polite “just say no” posture, and now The New York Times has reported that the Microsoft board is about to authorize going “hostile” on Yahoo by authorizing a proxy contest to replace the Yahoo board. In the latest news, Yahoo announced late Tuesday that it has adopted a severance plan for all of its employees in case of a change of control of Yahoo.

headline.main: Yahoo Plays It Safe, For Now
